duration_raw: until the end of your next turn
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">
[Fey Disappearance](/Spells.aspx?ID=2109)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 264 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Bloodline**
[Fey](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=25)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the end of your next turn
</row>

</column>

---

You become [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=83) and ignore natural [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453) (such as underbrush). Any [hostile action](/Rules.aspx?ID=300) you use ends this invisibility, but you still ignore natural difficult terrain.

---
**Heightened (5th)** If you use a hostile action, the invisibility doesn't end.
name: Fey Disappearance

summary_markdown: You become [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=83) and ignore natural [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453) (such as underbrush).
text: Fey Disappearance Single Action Source Player Core 2 pg. 264 1.1 Bloodline Fey Duration until the end of your next turn --- You become invisible and ignore natural difficult terrain (such as underbrush). Any hostile action you use ends this invisibility, but you still ignore natural difficult terrain. --- Heightened (5th) If you use a hostile action, the invisibility doesn't end.
